item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:

9. Memory Safety without Lifetime Parameters (4 points | 8 comments)
10. Announcing FLOSS/fund: $1M per year for free and open source projects (6 points | no comments)
11. LocalStorage vs. IndexedDB vs. Cookies vs. OPFS vs. WASM-SQLite (20 points | 7 comments)
12. Call for submissions for a new CSS logo (6 points | no comments)
13. Safer with Google: Advancing Memory Safety (25 points | no comments)
14. Rogue Legacy code is now source available (8 points | 1 comment)
15. A minecraft server written in rust (20 points | 4 comments)
16. On the cruelty of really teaching computing science (3 points | no comments)
17. Why make software? (36 points | 20 comments)
18. Teaching old assert() new Tricks (1 points | no comments)
19. New passkey specifications will let users import and export them (32 points | 78 comments)
20. JPEG XL’s Modular Mode Explained (12 points | 1 comment)
21. The Stallman Report (144 points | 140 comments)
22. Unlocking the NES (for Former Dawn) (11 points | 4 comments)

24. Why `Pin` is a part of trait signatures (and why that's a problem) (8 points | no comments)
